Actually, I'm sure no one wants to see me naked, just ask my wife. 

And yes, we are doing a 2009 Shinsa in Sydney. We are also doing a London shinsa 
in November this year. I don't know the site yet, but will get that information out 
as soon as I have the details. The contact person, as always, is the venerable 
Graham Curtis.

Gordon
